buffLikePost.name: Buff post likes
buffLikePost.description: Likes and shares will bring your posts closer to more people. According to research, every 1 like, comment and share helps your post reach 6-7 new users. Interactive interactions are a way to increase proximity at no additional cost.

buffFollow.name: Buff profile follows
buffFollow.description: Because the number of friends is limited to 5000 people, that is not enough for you to have an effective business, so increasing followers is an effective way for your facebook nick. Increasing following will be an opportunity to have a wider audience of users know you and among them there will be potential customers for you. You can see with celebrities or individuals with a huge number of followers, each article they post receives a lot of user interaction. This is an important thing if you want to develop a personal facebook sales channel.

buffReviewFanpage.name: Buff fanpage reviews
buffReviewFanpage.description: Benefits of increasing facebook fan page rating: When you rate your Fanpage, users after using your product or service will return to be able to rate the quality and share their experience on the fanpage. From there, your page becomes more reputable with Facebook as well as customers

buffEyeStream.name: Buff stream eyes live
buffEyeStream.description: Increasing the eyes of the livestream makes your livestream more attractive and prominent, and the most important thing is that it stimulates the needs of our Vietnamese consumers, which is more and more prestige and quality. It's the crowd effect that increases the eyes of the livestream to you.

buffMemberGroup.name: Buff group members
buffMemberGroup.description: Help your group stand out and increase its prestige, attracting more members to join in the future

autoLikeMonth.name: Auto like month
autoLikeMonth.description: If you sell goods and want to increase your credibility to attract buyers, you can use this package. The system will automatically like your posts during the period you register. (5 posts per day + the number of likes you want)

autoCommentMonth.name: Auto comment month
autoCommentMonth.description: If you sell goods and want to increase your credibility to attract buyers, you can use this package. The system will automatically comment on your posts during the period you register. (5 posts per day + number of likes you want + content you want to comment on)
